评论详情: Loose and flowy but still flattering. Perfect for summer or throwing over your swimsuit. Good quality, super soft.
This shirt is not just cute, but a lifesaver. I wear it mainly when I am out doing yard work. The mesh helps keep me cool. The length is perfect and the best part is it is soft and comfortable.
Love the fabric and style, however, even though I ordered a small, it is long and a little fuller than my style.  Will be altering.
Comfortable, long and pretty.
I thought the "Blue 3" color was going to be the purple-y color, it was not.  It was just the blue 4 color, so that was disappointing.  The fit is great and it's flowy and comfy.

I love the material, it doesn't show sweat. It has tiny holes in the fabric for ventilation. Great for my Zumba class. I have the floral print and the colors are bright and it's very pretty. I've received lots of compliments from my Zumba friends.
I like my tanks a little roomy so I’m glad I ordered a large. I’m 5’1” and 135 and the large was roomy enough for me. It’s very lightweight and comfy. I think it’s quite cute!
I absolutely love this top.  It fits beautifully and is extremely comfortable.  Great quality and value.  Loved it so much I ordered another one!
This top is quite blousy, which I like. It's modest and keeps you cool by not clinging. Washing it a breeze and dries quickly.
I am 6'2" and 270lbs. This was plenty long and not tight around my mid section.

评论概述: Color says blue but looks purple was hoping
评论详情: Sooo the picture of the color is way off but was hoping it was more purple.  Fits just right a little long for us shorter people
I ordered in purple but was a bit disappointed when it arrived to see it’s actually blue.  But the fit and feel of the fabric is very nice, so I’m keeping it

评论概述: Cool loose tank for my walks
评论详情: Perfect length and kept me cool during my walks under Texas sun. I will order more.
This is a little too long for me. I tie it in a knot on one side and it looks really cute like that. I’m glad I didn’t have to return it. I like the bold colors.
This shirt fits perfect and is very soft BUT I looked forward to getting a vibrant purple but it's a very dull color.

I love the cut on this tank top and it's very flattering to wear. I appreciate how it's loose fitting and doesn't cling. I don't wear it to workout - I just wear it as a regular tank top. It doesn't "read" as gym wear so it doesn't stand out as gym wear (not that I care). I got the green and it matches what's in the item picture.  I'm happy with the sizing on it - I'm 5'4" and 145 lbs and I bought true to size.

评论概述: mesh work out tank --needs to be layered
评论详情: definitely a work out tank  --which is fine --just not what I expected--this color is pretty see thru soooo there is that--just know it's not something you will be wearing on the regular--good gym work out tank with a sports bra and another top under it lol
I’m 5’3” with a small torso and this looks like a dress on me. Comfortable but looks awkward on me.
Great quality comfortable would buy again

评论概述: Can't speak highly enough about this top
评论详情: I love everything about this top. I am plus size due to medications and working on slimming down; I have been a rock climber for the past 13 years. The past few years have seen fewer and fewer climbs as not only my weight has spiraled but it's hard to find clothing that I can climb in that isn't too tight or too loose or horrific looking. I feel like I want to climb in a burqa at my weight, I am HORRIBLY self-conscious but the sport doesn't really allow for that. I bought one of these tops thinking it would be probably another dismal failure.  It wasn't, I love it, and I have 4 more in my cart for when I get paid tomorrow. it feels like I am wearing nothing yet when I look in a mirror I am all covered especially my scary bits aka midsection. I don't LOVE how I look in photos, even these ones, but for once I feel unencumbered and can go and boulder a little with my climbing friends even though I am not yet at a great weight for climbing. And I will share these less than awesome pics that my partner took of me bouldering because it shows what an XL looks like on a 225 lb, 5'6" woman.  Progress, not perfection. I am SO relieved to have found these tops and recommend to any woman: they are true to size and they do a really good job covering what's needed without being tight or constricting OR being too loose and flowy and getting in the way.
Great for my work outs or as a cool summer top. Arm holes are higher than other running tops so you can wear alone, with a sports bra or with a camisole. Not too sheer but light weight.

评论概述: loose, cool, flattering, mesh style is see-through
评论详情: Perfect for summer!  This lovely blouse camouflages my spreading middle aged middle.  It's just long enough to cover the important bits.  The neckline is perfect to cover a bra without being high necked.  The flash makes it look more see-through than it is in natural indoor light.  In the photo, I'm wearing a small in white flower mesh.  I'm 5'2' with a long torso (that's a nice way of saying that my legs are short, but it also means that the top will still provide crotch coverage if you are a few inches taller than me), and weigh 115lb.  I'm going to try the solids next.  One of my favorite clothing purchases this year.  Definitely recommended!
Cute, flowy top. Lightweight but not cheap material. Would buy again. Stayed cool during work out.
Pretty color, soft material, but it falls too short and doesn't reach my hips.
I really love the pattern and the fabric. It is not clingy, but is Nicely flowy. I wish they had other patterns because I would’ve bought those too!

I wear this for confidently for swimming (bralette underneath and skort) or doing gardening or running errands. Great looking top, with great ventilation for drying from water and hot days and doesnt look like i just swam. I ordered my ususal size Lg.
I ordered purple as matched local sport's team. It is PINK, not purple. Though I like the fit, length, etc. disappointed it is pink (fuchsia) as color represented in picture is completely different.
There was no bra. Nice color and fabric though
This shirt is good quality and fits perfectly.
Loose fitting. Cute top. Not clingy. Could wear it casually Got extra large, (d cup) and have a belly, so thi is still flattering and cute while I work out

评论概述: Colors are not as they appear
评论详情: I have tried several of these. The fit is great. Mon clingy and covers crotch and bum. But one top was mesh-totally see thru. The solids are more of a heather or a tweed- if you will. So the colors are not quite as they appear -on my iPhone anyway.
Very comfortable and roomy.  Great for hot yoga or other activities. Cute print

I'm 5'2", weigh 145 lbs and I ordered a Medium which fits bigger than I thought it would, therefore it's not very flattering since it's a bit too long for me. It's definitely comfortable but I think a Small would fit better. I have washed it a few times since I bought it and so far, the material seems durable, which is great for the price.
I needed a workout top that was cute but that could keep me cool. This is the one.

Very nice top good material excellent fit,some material looks good in pictures then when you get it your disappointed this is not the case here fit is good material light and airy without being thin and cheap. Great buy
This shirt is comfortable and true to size.

评论概述: Buy your size don’t size up
评论详情: Definitely don’t size up, I’m 5’1” 145 pounds with smaller chest with wider shoulders but 10-12 hips and I sized up to a large to hide my belly and it’s huge on me . It’s too large in chest underarms and back and shoes my bra and everything. There is no fitted bra that would make this shirt amazing if it did.  Medium or small would have fit prolly.  I wear large in a lot of shirts but some styles small and medium too it’s always a guess as a lady. I love the style and wish I had a smaller size that fits me but tags got cut off. If I get more money maybe I’ll try again I hate shopping online for that reason. This shirt is definitely flowy and spacious. The quality and feel of the material felt super nice. Now I’m wishing for a medium size shirt to try got to save up another month or so lol.
Fit is really good.  Just the right amount of looseness.  Really like the fabric!
It's lightweight, breathable, summer is going to be cooler with this shirt on
Great for pickleball
I bought my normal size and couldn’t begin to get it in!!! Has to size up 2 sizes

评论概述: A good buy! Info. provided to help choose sizes.
评论详情: I really love this mesh floral top for workouts!!! For my body shape the xl ended up not being roomy enough at my chest thus making it fit more snug elsewhere than I hoped for BUT #1 I am a petite framed/bone structure & 5ft lady but with a busty BUSTY chest #2 I prefer extra long and flowy than most people deem long and flowy and #3 it is so lightweight airy stretchy but strong that I would LOVE to wear it as a normal tee so I am definitely ordering more in BOTH xl and xxl. PLEASE MIUSY make more mesh print tees!!!! Ps: if wasnt for my chest i would easily fit a med and a large. Also it isn't as long as I expected on me-the tee falls at my upper hip so it doesnt fully cover my little booty.

评论概述: NiceI, but green color is off
评论详情: This shirt fits nice, it’s very lightweight and flattering. I saw the green color as a little more of a turquoise green. But it’s actually more of a mint green. Otherwise I would’ve given it a five star rating.
Love these for when I walk cool

This shirt is super cute and flowy.  It in no way runs small, and might even run a bit large.  I usually wear a small to medium in tops, and like my tops a bit loose.  This top was not offered in small, so I went with medium, and even with my style preference of being a bit loose, this was much too big.  If they had a small it probably would have fit well.  So if you are a true small, this is not the shirt for you.  I wish it fit me, because it was just the style I was looking for.  I wanted something flowy...but this was simply too big for me.

I like the cut and fabric but runs a bit small. I normally wear large in this style for for this on I need an XL it fits too snug in the bust and there is no nice drap to the fabric. It fit in semi form fit to waist and hips. I purchased the large based on size Amazon recommended. I'm 5'7" 170lbs 42 Bust DDD, 34 waist, 43 hip
Like the mesh fabric. Has doubled as a swimsuit top. Good fit .

Sizing is accurate. I was worried it might run small so I ordered a size up. I'm 5'4" and 165lbs and like my clothing loose. Ordered an XL and it's baggy even for someone who likes loose clothing. Coulda gone with a large. Very comfortable and the quality seems good for the price. Fabric is very much like Under Armour shirts.
I love this too but it is a bit more seethrough than I anticipated. Interestingly that isn’t the case from the other shirts bought from the same store.
This top is not purple,  more of a blueish.

评论概述: gorgeous print, a little longer than expected
评论详情: I'm tall (5'9") and this was a little longer than expected. For playing pickleball/tennis, I use a hair rubberband to bunch in the corner and make a little shorter. The print is gorgeous and matches almost every color of the rainbow and solved some problems with me matching a few odd colors I had in my athletic wear! Extremely breathable and light, and I get many compliments.
Love that it's longer to cover butt Comfortable Soft washes nicely

Love love the way these tops fit and feel. I like how lite, airy flowy and silky/satin type of feel they have. NOT that clingy cotton type of fabric. I’ve tried other brands with the exact same style, even more expensive, but all had that same clingy cotton jersey like material EXCEPT for this Brand Miusey!! I am short and chunky ( Hips,thighs and big bottom & Chest I bought X-Large in almost every color and style and the size/style has been sewn consistently the same. The tops in extra large completely cover my bottom with Room to spare. I always wear a camisole underneath. My Dog walking and Exercise Outfit. This is my own personal preference. I am 5’2” and I weigh about 145lbs. Hopefully this review has been helpful
Great vibrant colors

I got this for the gym. I wore it at home before, to check the size. Big mistake. Now it's my favorite nightshirt or to sit around the house. I'll have to get another for the gym. It's silky and comfy. It's beautiful and feminine. The fit is just right. I will order several more.

True size… that is the reason one orders bigger size workout items is to have it bigger and not clingy.  Some people like things bigger just so one feels more comfortable in it.  I don’t like tight fitting - never have. A larger size should be larger not tight fitting. The items are very nice but my opinion. Because of it, unfortunately, I will not order again. Thank you.
Very nice top. Nice material and washes well.

评论概述: At the blouse actually runs smaller than the size that it says it is
评论详情: I really like a blouse. It seems to be really nice but it doesn’t fit me. It’s too small I did order the size that I wear because I thought it was running in the right size but it does run a little small.
Love the bright colors. Fits as expected.

Perfect gym top for those of us who like something loose and that covers your backside. The added design on the upper back gives this tank a nice feminine touch. Cool, breathable, and wicking. Bought 3 in different colors and will purchase more.

When I was 164 I wore a large but lost 20 pounds and I’m very happy with the medium. I was worried that it would be too tight around my arm holes because my arms didn’t get that much smaller so I always have that problem. This is roomy though. It’s not great for yoga because it is loose but the cut is fluttering and on me sits right about that my crotch just covering so I like that when I’m wearing tight workout clothes

评论概述: Very comfortable; sleeve holes not too big!
评论详情: I worried the sleeve holes would be too big, but this fits just fine (assuming a workout bra underneath). It's very comfortable, lightweight. Although it's mesh, you can't see through it.

评论概述: Same Sizes Vary--Make Sure to Try On!
评论详情: I have this tank in the gray (2XL) and it's my absolute favorite. I could probably wear it every day if I didn't have to wash it! I ordered the same size in black, but it was significantly larger than the gray. It was wider and the armholes hung down and gapped. So, the gray is still my favorite shirt, but I recommend trying the shirt on before taking the tags off, as there is a large discrepancy in the cuts for the same size.

评论概述: Not flowy as the picture shows
评论详情: I have several of these type of tank tops that I ordered last summer. Unfortunately they have no tag and I can't find them in my order again section. These tops ARE NOT flowy as the pic makes them appear. Steer clear if you are plus size, as they emphasize your mid section big time. They may work with a control top high waste legging but definitely not with a regular legging.

4.8 Stars. This shirt is great, good quality, good price. Excellent shirt for working out, hiking/backpacking. Doesn't rub under the arm pits. Fits well on top and balloons out so it doesn't squeeze all your rolls. Material does not dry as quickly as I was hoping for but it does dry more quickly than cotton. I would definitely buy it again.

评论用户: Amazon did a horrible job of packaging. Cans dented badly.
评论详情: Very comfortable, breathable

This tank top is a good length as expected, (I bought the M - I'm 5'6 140lbs) I'm not crazy about the fabric, it's soft and gives good coverage, it's flowy, comfortable, it's a little big in the arm holes but not bad, I think it will shrink a little after washing but if not, no big deal over all I like it!
This is very light weight, cool and comfortable. Washes and drys easily. No ironing needed. Mesh type material similar to athletic shorts. Fit is perfect as described.
It's lightweight, fits well.  It's a it see-through so be careful what you wear under it.
Love it great color and love to wear it for Pilates.
This top is lightweight, flattering, a great raspberry color, and feels good when I work out.  I took off a star because I think it was a bit pricey.

I had a couple of workout shirts from other vendors that are cut in a much less flattering, tighter style, but this shirt is much nicer and quickly becoming my favorite! Nice pattern and colors goes with lots of different leggings too.
I was disappointed that this tank was not made of the same mesh type fabric as the black floral tank that I ordered previously.

Very comfy tank for working out. I have a big belly, so loose and flowy tanks appeal to me. I am between sizes, so based on other reviews, I got my smaller size. I would describe the fit as neither loose nor fitted, it's just right. I am 5'5" 215 lbs with large bust and tummy. Also, the armholes are properly sized for not showing side-bra, but not tight on my muscular arms either. Overall, great fit, I will buy in more colors.

I love this top!  So much so that I just ordered the Camo Red and Camo Green as well.  The patterned ones are a mesh fabric, and so cool and comfortable.  The material is substantial -- not flimsy at all -- and I expect it will last a very long time.  It's a very pretty pattern, too.  It also drapes nicely and your bulges and pooches don't show.  ;)  The top runs a tad small, so you'll want to order one size up.

评论概述: I’m 5’7” but length is too long.
评论详情: Liked the material, but color could have been darker for my likings. Hangs nice and not tight around mid area, but hangs very long.

评论概述: Ver y nicely made quality top.
评论详情: Runs bit large. Should have down sized, usually wear a medium and do better with petite’s.  Went by the size chart and it looked just I’d need a large....not the case, because it is a very loose and wide at bottom. Great quality top though. Perfect color match. Love the fabric!

I wanted something super breathable, and I hate anything hugging my tummy.  I also sweat to death and wanted to mask it.  I wanted a printed shirt and its perfect.  Its  vented all over, tummy flattering and  you cant tell its mesh.  its light and airy.  Also you cant see that it is drenched and no undergarments showing through.  love it.  btw I bought it in three different colors.

I now have 4 of these, all 3 prints and 1 solid (which I haven't tried yet). Prints have billions of vent holes, solids do not. Got them for yard work in Texas and the prints are cooler than my ratty bamboo tops. I got the camo first and wore it so many days in a row my husband asked me how many I bought, lol.  Tip: get rid of the scratchy tag before you even put it on! but they get 5 stars anyway!
Wore it on the beach.  It was very comfortable and dried fast.  The multiple colors made it easy to match different bottoms.
This shirt reminded me of football jerseys, the way the material is made. It’s an okay top.
This top is soft, silky and lightweight. Vibrant colors and breathable. True to size. Not too short or clingy!
The size was perfect and the material was sooo soft! I like it so much I ordered several more!
This top fits loosely, without the armpits being too big.  It is breathable and the material moves nicely.
Them hem of the shirt is not wide enough to be flowy. It fits loose, but not flowy like description says of picture shows.

评论概述: Definitely pretty, but a tight fit
评论详情: When buying plus size clothes, you never know if a 2X will fit the same way as another brand. With this one, the 2X is exceptionally close-fitting. Moreover, there was no flowiness to it either and, due to the tightness, it kept riding up a little over the bust. Nevertheless, it fits well enough and is fairly breathable that I can wear it for cycling and the cloth is so pretty that I enjoyed wearing it for that alone. I would advise getting it a size larger if you are busty or are otherwise not a 'slim fit'.
I absolutely love these shirts! They are cool and flowy! I have every color!!

评论概述: Love the fabric, fit and color, great for all workouts!!
评论详情: Love the fabric, fit and color.  Bought 4 of these tops and have a nice fresh comfy workout wardrobe now.  Recommend to anyone for weight training, yoga, tennis and pickleball

评论概述: It's very comfortable but looks big on me.
评论详情: It is very comfortable but looks big on me.  I got the small.
Perfect fit and very comfortable.  Material is light and cool and the tank covers all my undesirable areas.

I'm 5'6" and I got the red and the green in medium. Fits perfect for running, not too tight, not too big. Great quality, perfect length to cover my hips. Also, the red color is softer and lighter than it seems in the picture. which is perfect. and the green is not as bright and gaudy as it looks in the picture. its much more pastel and classy.
Size up if you order this top. I’m 5’3 143 pounds with a tummy. It’s shows my rolls and to tight. I followed the size chart and should have sized up. I’ll keep it and May give it to my daughter.
It took me 3 attempts to find the perfect t-shirt and I did!!
needed more tank tops for traveling in the unbearable heat and humidity of an eastern US summer. even when there's no way to be comfortable, they still keep me cooler than the alternatives.
Love this too. Covers my belly, without making me look fat!! light weight, nice and cool.

评论概述: Cool comfy and flattering ! Great for tennis
评论详情: I love this tank!! I wear it for tennis. I like my tanks longer and not too tight. I’m 5’4 175lbs. I ordered large. It’s very cool and comfy on the court, and flattering. I got the floral / black and also the black/red print. It has breathable teeny holes in the fabric. Not sure about the solid colors
The back is much wider, not as cut out as the images show. Fabric is cheaply made, super thin & unflattering. But cut is not even close to images.

评论概述: Was not the right fit but it’s really nice !
评论详情: Good work out attire!
I ordered the green top. I’m built more pear shaped so I was happy when the shirt fit around my hips & bum. Super comfy & cool. I wear between L & XL. I would order up if you’re in between.
Very comfortable, fits true to size. I liked it so much, I bought multiple colors!
